title: Broken Clock
desc:
Post 93
- If your turn would be skipped cause you took too long to take your turn, you instead get another 12 hours to take your turn.
- You may reroll this item at any time.
- **Passive.**
- If the host forgets to not skip your turn, you may instead use this to heal 1 <:charge:1240849067362488403> and gain a <:corrupted_charge:1240975576324509787>.
